summary: A female school teacher is implicated in a murder in a Sicilian town only hours after her arrival. The dead man insulted her on the bus on the way into town. As the mystery unfolds, it ... See full summary »
cast: Jennifer O'Neill|Franco Nero|James Mason|Orazio Orlando|Aldo Giuffrè|Claudio Gora|Luigi Bonos|Carla Calò|Gino Pagnani|Franco Fabrizi|Oreste Baldini|Alessandro Maugeri|Rosario Bonaventura|Lino De Agró|Fernando Jelo|Calogero Milazzo|Matteo di Mauro|Giuseppe Pellegrino|Marcello Perracchio|Ugo Piscitello|Francesco Platania|Mario Pulvirenti|Ottorino Russo|Agostino Scuderi|Orazio Torrisi|Salvatore Seminara|Antonio Micalizzi|Francesco Sanfilippo
title: Gente de respeto
